languages.text: "Я уже подавал запрос машиновидцам. Не буду оскорблять ваш слух ответом про "то ли через час, то ли через десять терранских лет". Они понятия не имеют, но умоляют дать им шаттл и позволить поковыряться в этой штуковине. Все, начиная с высшего офицерского состава и заканчивая последним техноматом".

"I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."
languages.original_text: "Я уже подавал запрос машиновидцам. Не буду оскорблять ваш слух ответом про "то ли через час, то ли через десять терранских лет". Они понятия не имеют, но умоляют дать им шаттл и позволить поковыряться в этой штуковине. Все, начиная с высшего офицерского состава и заканчивая последним техноматом".

traits.locale_text: "I have sent a request to enginseers already and I won't be insulting your ears with a ‘maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of an answer. They have no idea, but still plead to give them a shuttle and allow digging into this thing for a while. Everyone starting with senior officers and up to the last technomat."

"I have sent a request to enginseers already and I won't be insulting your ears with a ‘maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of an answer. They have no idea, but still plead to give them a shuttle and allow digging into this thing for a while. Everyone starting with senior officers and up to the last technomat."

"I have sent a request to enginseers already and I won't be insulting your ears with a ‘maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but keep begging for a shuttle and some time to dig into this thing. Everyone from the senior officers and all the way down to the last technomat."

"I have sent a request to enginseers already and I won't be insulting your ears with a ‘maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but keep begging for a shuttle and some time to dig into this thing. Everyone from the senior officers and all the way down to the last technomat."

"I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

languages.text: “我已经向引擎先知提出了要求，我可不敢用‘或许一个小时，也或许要十个泰拉年’之类的废话侮辱您的耳朵。他们还没有得出结果，但他们一直在努力调查。上至高阶军官，下至普通技工，都对这件事情非常上心。有些人甚至想申请一艘穿梭机，亲自去探个究竟。”
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

traits.locale_text: “我已经向引擎先知提出了要求，我可不敢用‘或许一个小时，也或许要十个泰拉年’之类的废话侮辱您的耳朵。他们还没有得出结果，但他们一直在努力调查。上至高阶军官，下至普通技工，都对这件事情非常上心。有些人甚至想申请一艘穿梭机，亲自去探个究竟。”

languages.text: « J'ai déjà envoyé une requête aux technaugures et je ne vous ferai pas l'affront d'une réponse du genre "peut-être dans une heure, peut-être dans dix ans". Ils n'en ont pas la moindre idée, mais ça n'empêche pas l'ensemble de l'équipage, des officiers supérieurs aux plus humbles technomates, de quémander une navette et la permission d'aller mener l'enquête sur place. »
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà envoyé une requête aux technaugures et je ne vous ferai pas l'affront d'une réponse du genre "peut-être dans une heure, peut-être dans dix ans". Ils n'en ont pas la moindre idée, mais ça n'empêche pas l'ensemble de l'équipage, des officiers supérieurs aux plus humbles technomates, de quémander une navette et la permission d'aller mener l'enquête sur place. »

languages.text: "Ich habe bereits eine anfrage an die Maschinenseher geschickt. Ich will Eure Ohren nicht beleidigen mit einer Antwort wie 'vielleicht in einer Stunde, vielleicht in zehn terranischen Jahren'. Sie haben keine Ahnung. Trotzdem flehen sämtliche Zahnräder auf dem Schiff um ein Shuttle und um die Erlaubnis, sich in dem Ding umzusehen, von den obersten Offizieren bis hin zum niedersten Technomaten."
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe bereits eine anfrage an die Maschinenseher geschickt. Ich will Eure Ohren nicht beleidigen mit einer Antwort wie 'vielleicht in einer Stunde, vielleicht in zehn Terranischen Jahren'. Sie haben keine Ahnung. Trotzdem flehen sämtliche Zahnräder auf dem Schiff um ein Shuttle und um die Erlaubnis, sich in dem Ding umzusehen, von den obersten Offizieren bis hin zum niedersten Technomaten."

languages.text: «Ya he enviado una solicitud a los visioingenieros y no quisiera mentirle diciendo "quizá en una hora", "quizá en diez años terranos". No tienen ni idea, pero eso no evita que cada uno de ellos, desde los oficiales superiores hasta el último tecnómata, siga pidiendo una lanzadera y permiso para investigar este asunto».
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

traits.locale_text: «Ya he enviado una solicitud a los visioingenieros y no quisiera mentirle diciendo "quizá en una hora", "quizá en diez años terranos". No tienen ni idea, pero eso no evita que cada uno de ellos, desde los oficiales superiores hasta el último tecnómata, siga pidiendo una lanzadera y permiso para investigar este asunto».

languages.text: 「すでに機関整備師に依頼は出してある。『1時間後か、地球歴で10年後かも』なんて耳障りな返答をする気はない。彼らは何もわかっていないが、それでも艦内の歯車ども、上級士官から最後のテクノマットに至るまでが、シャトルとあの物体を調べる許可をくれと懇願している」
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."

traits.locale_text: 「すでに機関整備師に依頼は出してある。『1時間後か、地球歴で10年後かも』なんて耳障りな返答をする気はない。彼らは何もわかっていないが、それでも艦内の歯車ども、上級士官から最後のテクノマットに至るまでが、シャトルとあの物体を調べる許可をくれと懇願している」

languages.text: "Mühedyumlara bildiri yolladım. 'Belki bir saat, belki on Terra yılı sonra.' gibi bir cevapla sizi aşağılamak istemem. Bir şey bildikleri yok ama en kıdemli subayından teknomatına kadar herkes, bir mekiğe binip o zımbırtıyı kurcalamak için can atıyor."
languages.original_text: "I have sent a request to the Enginseers already. I won't insult your ears with a 'maybe in an hour, maybe in ten Terran years' type of answer. They have no idea, but that doesn't stop every cog on board, from the senior officers and down to the last technomat, from begging for a shuttle and permission to poke around in that thing."
